:: Battera  ::

She sat in her chair and sighed.  She just hoped that Rex and Firearm 
weren't too mad at her to speak badly of her to the leader of the 
Maximals.  She still had yet to meet this leader.  But for now, she 
just hoped that Rex and Firearm wouldn't come in to her room and yell 
thier heads off at her.
